definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: 8 He predicted 68 for the atomic mass.
sentences.chinese: 他預測它的原子質量是。

sentences.english: I already showed you the atomic mass.
sentences.chinese: 我已經向你們展示了原子質量了。

sentences.english: And he was very proficient at measuring atomic mass.
sentences.chinese: 他對測量原子質量很精通。

sentences.english: He predicted 68 for the atomic mass.
sentences.chinese: 他預測它的原子質量是。
